navigation.tagline: Manage your RSS and YouTube content in one place

auth.registerDescription: Welcome to FeedTune! Create an account now and start managing your content.
auth.loginDescription: Sign in to your account and continue where you left off.
auth.termsNotice: By registering, you agree to our terms of service.

verification.title: Verify Your Email
verification.description: Verify your email address before you start using your account
verification.emailSentTo: We've sent a verification email to {email}
verification.step1: Open your email and click on the verification link
verification.step2: Clicking the link will redirect you to a verification page
verification.step3: After verification is complete, you can log in to your account
verification.emailResent: Verification email has been resent. Please check your inbox.
verification.resendError: An error occurred while sending the verification email. Please try again later.

feeds.title: My Feeds
feeds.description: Browse content from your followed sources
feeds.noFeeds: You haven't added any feeds yet.
feeds.syncDescription: Get the latest content from source sites
feeds.allItemsAlreadyRead: All items have already been read

emptyFilterState.title: No Content Found
emptyFilterState.description: No content matches your filter criteria. You can try changing your filters or viewing all content.

feeds.markAsReadErrorDescription: There was a problem marking items as read.
feeds.emptyContentDescription: No content found to display. You can reset filters, add a new feed, or refresh existing content.

addFeed.title: Add Feed
addFeed.description: Select the type of feed you want to follow

addYoutubeFeed.title: Add YouTube Channel
addYoutubeFeed.searchPlaceholder: Enter channel ID, URL or username
addYoutubeFeed.searchDescription: You can enter a YouTube channel URL, ID or username (@username)
addYoutubeFeed.loadingDescription: Fetching YouTube channel information, please wait...
addYoutubeFeed.loadErrorDescription: There was a problem getting channel information. Please try a different channel ID or name.
addYoutubeFeed.quotaErrorDescription: The YouTube API quota seems to be exceeded. This usually happens for the following reasons:
addYoutubeFeed.quotaErrorReason1: YouTube's API usage quota has reached the daily limit
addYoutubeFeed.quotaErrorReason2: YouTube API might be temporarily unavailable
addYoutubeFeed.quotaErrorReason3: Too many requests have been made
addYoutubeFeed.quotaErrorSolution: In this case, you can try the following options:
addYoutubeFeed.noVideos: No videos found for this channel

deleteFeed.title: Delete Feed
deleteFeed.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this feed? This action cannot be undone.
deleteFeed.success: Feed and all related data deleted successfully

feedList.title: Your Feeds
feedList.description: All your RSS and YouTube feeds
feedList.noFeeds: You haven't added any feeds yet

emptyState.title: No feeds yet
emptyState.description: Start by adding an RSS or YouTube feed

loadingState.subdescritpion: Please wait while we fetch your content

feeds.emptyFeedDescription: No content found for this feed. Check back later or try refreshing.
feeds.emptyFavoritesDescription: You don't have any favorite content yet. Click the heart icon to add content to favorites.
feeds.emptyReadLaterDescription: Your reading list is empty. Click the bookmark icon to add content to your reading list.
feeds.emptySearchDescription: No content matches your search query. Try different keywords or view all content.
feeds.emptyFilterDescription: No content matches your selected filters. Try changing your filters or using less restrictive ones.
feeds.emptyDefaultDescription: No content found to display in this section. Check back later or try adding new sources.

home.title: Manage Your Content with FeedTune
home.subtitle: Collect, organize, and follow your RSS feeds and YouTube channels in one place.

hero.tagline: Manage your RSS and YouTube content in one place

onboarding.title: Easy Onboarding
onboarding.description: Start quickly with a simple interface and track your sources

analytics.title: Content Analytics
analytics.description: Track your reading habits and discover your favorite sources

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Adjust the appearance and features to your own needs

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Benefits of FeedTune
features.description: Manage your content more efficiently with FeedTune

rssFeeds.title: RSS Feeds
rssFeeds.desc: Follow the latest content from your favorite websites

youtube.title: YouTube Channels
youtube.desc: Follow your favorite YouTube channels like RSS feeds

organization.title: Content Organization
organization.desc: Add content to favorites or save for later reading

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.desc: Dark mode support that doesn't strain your eyes

layout.title: Modern Interface
layout.description: Access your content instantly with a user-friendly and customizable interface.

filter.title: Advanced Filtering
filter.description: Easily filter content by type, status, or source type.

rss.title: RSS Support
rss.description: Supports all RSS and Atom feeds, regularly updates content.

youtube.title: YouTube Integration
youtube.description: Follow YouTube channels and never miss new videos.

favorites.title: Favorite Content
favorites.description: Add important content to your favorites for easy access later.

readLater.title: Read Later
readLater.description: Add content to your reading list to read later.

languages.title: Multi-Language Support
languages.description: Use the app in your own language with different language options.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Use it comfortably at night with dark mode that reduces eye strain.

search.title: Quick Search
search.description: Find what you want instantly by searching among your content.

home.performanceDescription: FeedTune is developed using the most modern web technologies. It offers fast loading times, instant updates, and a seamless experience.
home.performanceFeature1Description: Next.js SSR is used for fast page loads.
home.performanceFeature2Description: Smooth and performant animations with Framer Motion.
home.performanceFeature3Description: Perfect viewing experience on all devices.

feedManagement.title: Your Feeds
feedManagement.noFeeds: Add RSS or YouTube sources you want to follow
feedManagement.addFeedDescription: Add a new RSS or YouTube source

recentContent.title: Recent Content
recentContent.noContent: Content from your feeds will appear here

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.noFavorites: You don't have any favorite content yet
favorites.addToFavorites: Visit the feeds page to add content to favorites

readLater.title: Read Later
readLater.description: View content you've saved to read later
readLater.noItems: You don't have any items in your read later list yet
readLater.addToReadLater: Visit the feeds page to add content to your read later list

settings.title: Settings

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: View and update your profile information
profile.emailHelp: Your email address cannot be changed
profile.avatarHelp: Add a valid image URL for your profile picture
profile.updateError: An error occurred while updating profile

settings.compactModeDescription: Display feeds in a more compact view
settings.feedRefreshDescription: How often feeds should automatically refresh
settings.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

errors.emailExists: This email is already in use

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: You can use the following keyboard shortcuts to navigate faster
